content: Phase 1 POC: Create core MongoDB models and service functions (generate_daily_pack, randomize_answers, score_attempt, compute_leaderboard, lock_quiz)
Phase 1 POC: Create seed data script with 10+ topics and 30+ questions
Phase 1 POC: Write test_core.py covering all 6 POC user stories
Phase 1 POC: Run test_core.py and fix until all tests PASS
Phase 2: Build complete backend REST API with JWT auth and all endpoints
Phase 2: Get design guidelines from design_agent
Phase 2: Build complete React PWA frontend (user app + admin panel)
Phase 2: End to End Testing using Testing Agent - verify all 10 user stories
Phase 2: Fix all bugs found by testing agent
